1520667301_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6n.body:
[krixano](#comment_374_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu)
You are welcome! And you can write me on ZeroMe, if any help needed in the future.
Or just ping our [Ukrainian community](http://127.0.0.1:43110/193psz3yGj7EH39nyKb4A2KKBXEHT49Csf), we'll help with translations or something else.

[krixano](#comment_375_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu), we have small changes for Ukrainian translation (changed 4 lines).
[V2 Version](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?1PpvHgysHyZk6AEaG38SzH2FXgcr74vJt5_3)
We saw you already applied V1, so sorry about late changes 🙃

> [krixano](#comment_376_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): It's definitely fine. It doesn't take long to do translations now that I have the groundwork done.

Ok, added 2 more lines. http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?1PpvHgysHyZk6AEaG38SzH2FXgcr74vJt5_3

```
All                               =       Усі
Bookmark                          =       Додати до улюбленного
Zite Creator / Maintainer         =       Засновник Zайту (модератор)
Uploaded by ...                   =       Додав ...
Show Merger Zites                 =       Показати Zайт-концентратори
Other                             =       Інший
```

> [krixano](#comment_377_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): I have just published the changes.

thanks, if we have any update, we'll ping you in the future 🙂

> [krixano](#comment_379_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): I know that "merger" doesn't translate well into some languages (by what some of the translators have said). What do you think I should do about this? Should I just keep the word in English? I don't fluently speak any other languages besides English, so I want to get the translations as understandable and good as possible.

Yep. Anyway we can translate "Merger Zite" as "Zайт Мерджер" (it's acceptable in general to use some English words with Ukrainian symbols) and "Merged Zites" as "Сполучені Zайти"
```
"Merger Zite": "Zайт Мерджер",
"Show Merger Zites": "Показати Zайт Мерджери",
"Merger-Supported (more info in sidebar, or below on mobile)": "Мерджер-сумісні (дивись інфо в бічній панелі, або нижче на мобільних)",
"There are no merger zites yet!": "Тут ще немає Zайт мерджерів!",
```
etc.

> [krixano](#comment_381_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): What do you think about what @caryoscelus said about using "супроводжуючий" instead of "модератор" for Maintainer?

I think we never use "супроводжуючий" in real life applies to clear net sites. So as for me it's better to use Moderator = модератор.
Also as alternative we can use Maintainer that is near 'Holder == Утримувач' or even acceptable 'Developer == Розробник'.
